title: conferred on me by section 36 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Nursing Homes Support Scheme
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Nursing Homes Support Scheme 

Act 2009 (Relevant Payments) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited nursing home support scheme act 2009 (relevant payments) regulation 2024

title: conferred on me by section 36 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009
heading: 2. These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation on 1
text_raw:
2. These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation on 1 

January 2023.
text_norm: 2 regulation shall deemed come operation 1 january 2023

title: conferred on me by section 36 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009
heading: In these Regulations “the Act of 2009” means the Nursing Homes
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations “the Act of 2009” means the Nursing Homes 

Support Scheme Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009).
text_norm: 3 regulation act 2009 mean nursing home support scheme act 2009 (no 15 2009)

title: conferred on me by section 36 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009
heading: 4. The class of ex gratia payment or payments specified in the Schedule to
text_raw:
4. The class of ex gratia payment or payments specified in the Schedule to 
these Regulations are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph (f) of the 
definition of “relevant payment” in paragraph 1 of Part 3 of Schedule 1 of the 
Act of 2009.
text_norm: 4 class ex gratia payment payment specified schedule regulation prescribed purpose paragraph (f) definition relevant payment paragraph 1 part 3 schedule 1 act 2009

title: conferred on me by section 36 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009
heading: SCHEDULE

title: conferred on me by section 36 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009
heading: 1. A payment or payments made to the person under the Hepatitis C
text_raw:
1. A payment or payments made to the person under the Hepatitis C 

Compensation Tribunal Acts 1997 to 2006. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 October, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [576] 3
text_norm: 1 payment payment made person hepatitis c compensation tribunal act 1997 2006 given official seal 23 october 2024 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th october 2024 576 3

title: conferred on me by section 36 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prescribe ex gratia payments for the purposes of paragraph 
(f) of the definition of “relevant payment” in paragraph 1 of Part 3 of Schedule 
1 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [576]
